definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
bit (of a bridle)/to hold in the mouth/to harbor (feelings)/to link/to accept/rank/title

sentences.english: Certification letters after the person's name mean nothing.
sentences.chinese: 那人名字後面的資格名銜沒有任何意義。

sentences.english: Finally, the ultimate winner will be granted the world tiltle.
sentences.chinese: 最後，終極勝方可贏得世界拳王名銜。

sentences.english: Nowhere do we claim for our concepts the title of a science.
sentences.chinese: 我絲毫不敢妄稱我們的概念具有科學的名銜。
